title: Oil Trades at One-Month High as Trump Vows to Tariff Iran Buyers
description: Oil rose to the highest level since early December after US President Donald Trump said he is imposing a 25% tariff on goods from countries “doing business” with Iran.
content: Oil rose to the highest level since early December after US President Donald Trump said he is imposing a 25% tariff on goods from countries “doing business” with Iran.
